properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Twaja mbele zako ee Bwana,
Na sadaka zetu (twaleta),
tunakutolea twakuomba upokee.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Twakutolea sadaka zetu,
ee Bwana,
twakuomba upokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kwa moyo safi twakutolea,
ee Bwana,
twakuomba upokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mazao yetu upokee,
twakupa,
kwa moyo wa mapendo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Na pesa zetu upokee,
twakupa,
kwa moyo wa mapendo.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Mkate na Divai twakupa,
pokea,
ni jasho letu Bwana.
